gd.gen-ai.global-error.comment: Generic error message displayed when the AI chatbot encounters an unexpected error

gd.gen-ai.global-error.description.value: Try restarting the chatbot and starting over.
gd.gen-ai.global-error.description.comment: User instruction on how to recover from a global error in the AI chatbot

gd.gen-ai.global-error.button-details.comment: Button label to show more detailed error information

gd.gen-ai.global-error.button-clear.comment: Button label to restart the AI chatbot and clear the current session

gd.gen-ai.global-no-llm.comment: Error message when no LLM provider is configured

gd.gen-ai.global-no-llm.description.value: Configure a provider to enable the chatbot.
gd.gen-ai.global-no-llm.description.comment: User instruction on how to configure a provider for the AI chatbot

gd.gen-ai.global-no-llm.button-create-ll.comment: Button label to configure a provider for the AI chatbot

gd.gen-ai.permission-error.comment: Error message when user does not have sufficient permissions to access the chatbot

gd.gen-ai.permission-error.description.value: You don’t have access to the chatbot. Contact your administrator to request access.
gd.gen-ai.permission-error.description.comment: User instruction on how to request access to the AI chatbot

gd.gen-ai.input-placeholder.comment: Placeholder text in the input field where users type their questions to the AI chatbot

gd.gen-ai.input-label.mac.value: Ask your question. Use control+space or cmd+I for suggestions.
gd.gen-ai.input-label.mac.comment: Label for the input field where users type their questions to the AI chatbot

gd.gen-ai.input-label.win.value: Ask your question. Use control+space or control+I for suggestions.
gd.gen-ai.input-label.win.comment: Label for the input field where Windows users type their questions to the AI chatbot

gd.gen-ai.feedback.like.comment: Button label to mark a message as helpful in the AI chatbot

gd.gen-ai.feedback.dislike.value: Mark this message as not helpful
gd.gen-ai.feedback.dislike.comment: Button label to mark a message as not helpful in the AI chatbot

gd.gen-ai.disclaimer.value: AI assistants can make mistakes. Check before relying on these answers.
gd.gen-ai.disclaimer.comment: Warning disclaimer about AI response accuracy shown to users

gd.gen-ai.dialog.label.comment: Label for the dialog containing the AI chatbot interface

gd.gen-ai.header.reset-tooltip.comment: Tooltip for button that resets the AI chatbot conversation

gd.gen-ai.header.contract-tooltip.comment: Tooltip for button that contracts the AI chatbot interface

gd.gen-ai.header.expand-tooltip.comment: Tooltip for button that expands the AI chatbot interface

gd.gen-ai.header.close-tooltip.comment: Tooltip for button that closes the AI chatbot interface

gd.gen-ai.welcome.line-1.comment: First line of the AI chatbot's welcome greeting

gd.gen-ai.welcome.line-2.comment: Second line of the AI chatbot's welcome greeting asking how to assist

gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-1.title.value: Search for a dashboard or visualization
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-1.title.comment: Title for the first suggested action option in the welcome screen

gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-1.answer.value: Sure thing, what kind of dashboard or visualization would you like to see?
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-1.answer.comment: AI chatbot's response when user selects the search option

gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-2.title.comment: Title for the second suggested action option in the welcome screen

gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-2.answer.value: Sure thing, what kind of visualization would you like to create?
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-2.answer.comment: AI chatbot's response when user selects the create visualization option

gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-3.title.comment: Title for the third suggested action option in the welcome screen

gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-3.answer.value: Sure thing, what business question would you like to answer?
gd.gen-ai.welcome.option-3.answer.comment: AI chatbot's response when user selects the business question option

gd.gen-ai.state.cancelled.comment: Status message displayed when the AI chatbot's evaluation is cancelled

gd.gen-ai.state.generating.comment: Status message displayed while the AI chatbot is generating a response

gd.gen-ai.button.send.comment: Button label to send a message to the AI chatbot

gd.gen-ai.button.save.comment: Button label to save a visualization created by the AI

gd.gen-ai.button.save_and_explore.comment: Button label to save a visualization and immediately open it for exploration

gd.gen-ai.button.cancel.comment: Button label to cancel the current operation

gd.gen-ai.save-dialog.label.comment: Label for the input field where users enter a name for their visualization

gd.gen-ai.save-dialog.title.comment: Title of the dialog for naming a visualization before saving

gd.gen-ai.save-dialog.description.value: Give your new visualization a new descriptive name, so it's easier to find it later on.
gd.gen-ai.save-dialog.description.comment: Description explaining why users should provide a descriptive name for their visualization

gd.gen-ai.save-dialog.description.explor.value: To open this visualization, it needs to be saved first. You can give it a name below.
gd.gen-ai.save-dialog.description.explor.comment: Description explaining that the visualization must be saved before it can be opened

gd.gen-ai.autocomplete.type.comment: Column header in autocomplete suggestions showing the type of data object

gd.gen-ai.autocomplete.dataset.comment: Column header in autocomplete suggestions showing the dataset name

gd.gen-ai.autocomplete.id.comment: Column header in autocomplete suggestions showing the object identifier

gd.gen-ai.autocomplete.attribute.comment: Column header in autocomplete suggestions showing the attribute name

gd.gen-ai.autocomplete.metric.comment: Column header in autocomplete suggestions showing the metric name

gd.gen-ai.autocomplete.fact.comment: Column header in autocomplete suggestions showing the fact name

gd.gen-ai.autocomplete.date.comment: Column header in autocomplete suggestions showing the date

gd.gen-ai.autocomplete.input-info.mac.comment: Keyboard shortcut instructions for Mac users to trigger autocomplete suggestions

gd.gen-ai.autocomplete.input-info.win.comment: Keyboard shortcut instructions for Windows users to trigger autocomplete suggestions

gd.gen-ai.visualisation.menu.comment: Accessibility label for the visualization actions menu

gd.gen-ai.visualisation.menu.button.save.comment: Menu option to save the current visualization
Menu option to save the current visualization as a new copy

gd.gen-ai.visualisation.menu.button.open.comment: Menu option to open the visualization in the full Analyze interface

gd.gen-ai.visualisation.menu.button.copy.comment: Menu option to copy a shareable link to the visualization

gd.gen-ai.messages.label.comment: Label for the chat messages section in the AI chatbot interface

gd.gen-ai.message.label.user.comment: Label identifying messages sent by the user in the chat conversation

gd.gen-ai.message.label.assistant.comment: Label identifying messages sent by the AI assistant in the chat conversation

gd.gen-ai.skip-messages-history.comment: Accessibility link to skip past the message history and go directly to the input field

gd.gen-ai.skip-navigation.comment: Accessibility link to skip past navigation elements in the interface
